Please select \nat least 3 of your interests You haven\'t subscribed any channel yet About Toffee Enjoy instant streaming on TV channels and exciting videos – all FREE on Toffee! \n\nLooking for a single app to cater to all your entertainment needs? \n\nDownload Toffee and enjoy instant buffer-less experience! Enjoy the ultimate streaming platform with access to 100+ local and international TV channels, movies, telefilms, music videos – all on-the-go. Not only that, you can now make your own video contents and earn money through Toffee. Access all of these from any internet network, and enjoy watching videos in the app absolutely free! \n\nSo why wait? Download Toffee and indulge in endless entertainment, anywhere! App Features – \u2713 Live Stream TV channels \n\u2713 Absolutely buffer-less experience \n\u2713 Easy content discoverability with refresh app interface \n\u2713 Access to 100+ TV, live sports, international mega series \n\u2713 Opportunity to earn money through user generated contents \n\u2713 FREE access for all users from any network! *Toffee is only available in Bangladesh ✓ Live Stream TV channels Absolutely buffer-less experience Easy content discoverability with refresh app interface Access to 100+ TV, live sports, international mega series Opportunity to earn money through user generated contents FREE access for all users from any network! Please try again later. Your internet connection is not stable. Please change your network and try again. Add Bio dynamic splash image Profile Under Deletion! You have initiated profile deletion from this phone number. Please use a different phone number to sign in, or continue to enjoy the free content on Toffee without signing in. Show Button Remove Button New Football Feature To see countdown, live scores, and match schedules during FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022™, please allow the - Display Over Other Apps permission now. days hrs mins sec separator bubble icon topbar background image Delete Everything Delete Profile & Data If you wish to proceed, your profile and data (identification data, channel data, and activities) will deleted permanently. If you have subscribed to any premium content, you will lose access to it. You can open a fresh new account with the same mobile number, or continue to enjoy the free content on Toffee without signing in. As per our guideline we may keep the data for 90 days before permanent deletion. Type DELETE if you are sure you want to continue Profile Deleted! Your profile and data will be deleted permanently within 60 days. You can continue to enjoy the free content on Toffee without a profile. Hooray! Welcome back to Toffee Lets Enjoy Your data and profile have been stopped from being deleted. Keep enjoying Toffee. Sorry, this content is currently not available. Please try again later. Thank you.
